description:
Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon is pummeling Jonouchi with punishing punches!  Valon’s helmet also feeds him crucial data on Jonouchi’s monsters, allowing Valon to analyze and assess the optimum strategy to render Jonouchi’s forces obsolete!  Can Jonouchi outthink the computer before he’s downsized into oblivion?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: フルアーマー・グラビテーション
